text:
Bhisadej Rajani (;; born 20 January 1922) is a Prince of Thailand. He is a member of the Thai royal family, and a member of the House of Rajani. He is one of the longest-living royal personages in the Thai history.
He was a close-friend of King Bhumibol Adulyadej. He is an author and worked as the directory of the Royal Project Foundation for the king. He is also a descendant of Siamese Vice-King Pinklao.
